channel.title: Posts on Dazai's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Dazai's blog

item.title: My Astrophotography Experience
item.description: Recently I’ve discovered the new hobby of astrophotography, although I don’t have a lot of the gear, I try to grab every opportunity to get a photo. Recently one of those opportunities came by, I rented a camera and the lens and went to the location. This post I’ll go through the process of taking these types of photos and what mistakes I made. (this was a first time experience for me too).

item.title: What is Fourier Series and How it Came to Be?
item.description:
The Fourier series is a mathematical concept which was developed by the French mathematician Jean-Baptiste Fourier in the early 19th century. He engraved his name in the mathematics hall of fame with the groundbreaking discovery of Fourier series.

Fourier’s key insight was that any function could be decomposed into a sum of sine and cosine waves with different amplitudes and frequencies. This discovery laid the foundation many areas science like physics, telecommunication etc.
